name: docthis-core
description: Automatically generates detailed docs-core comments in TypeScript and JavaScript files.

docthiscore.includeTypes.description: When enabled, type information is added to comment tags.

docthiscore.includeMemberOfOnClassMember.description: When enabled, memberOf information is added to comment tags on class members.

docthiscore.includeMemberOfOnInterfaceMe.description: When enabled, memberOf information is added to comment tags on interface members.

docthiscore.includeDescriptionTag.description: When enabled, JSDoc comments for functions and methods will include @description.

docthiscore.enableHungarianNotationEvalu.description: When enabled, hungarian notation will be used as a type hint.

docthiscore.inferTypesFromNames.description: When enabled, will use names of params & methods as type hints.

docthiscore.includeAuthorTag.description: When enabled, will add the @author tag.

docthiscore.authorName.default: (Set the text for this tag by adding docthiscore.authorName to your settings file.)
docthiscore.authorName.description: When docthiscore.includeAuthorTag is enabled, will add @author tag with this value.
